mapper.sql: a.cid AS "cid", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.icon AS "icon", a.color AS "color", a.sort AS "sort", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT c.cid AS "cid", c.channel_name AS "channelName", c.icon AS "icon" FROM qx_channels c WHERE c.del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qx_channels( cid, channel_name, icon, color, sort, update_time, create_time, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{cid}, #{channelName}, #{icon}, #{color}, #{sort}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE qx_channels SET cid = #{cid}, channel_name = #{channelName}, icon = #{icon}, color = #{color}, sort = #{sort}, update_time = #{updateTime}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE cid = #{cid}
